title: Trust God To Do it His Way | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Trust God To Do it His Way | Joel Osteen
description:
God doesn’t always answer our prayers the way we expect. His ways are not our ways, but you have to trust that He is still in control. He's about to do something in your life greater than anything you've seen. 


Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
